title: Biden’s comment on Taiwan clarified by administration official
content:
1. Biden’s comment on Taiwan clarified by administration official  Fox News
  2. Biden vowed US would ‘respond’ to Chinese invasion of Taiwan after Afghanistan debacle  Yahoo News
  3. Biden says U.S. allies like S. Korea are fundamentally different from Afghanistan  Arirang News
  4. U.S. position on Taiwan unchanged despite Biden comment - official  Reuters
  5. US position on Taiwan hasn’t changed, despite promise to defend it, administration says  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
